\usepackage[
    top=20truemm,
    bottom=20truemm,
    left=20truemm,
    right=20truemm
]{geometry}

\pagestyle{fancy}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\renewcommand{\sectionmark}[1]{\markright{\textit{\thesection\ #1}}{}}
\renewcommand{\chaptermark}[1]{\markboth{\textit{#1}}{}}

\title{\termUntitledDocument}
\author{\termJohnDoe}

\usepackage[english]{babel}

%\usepackage[
%    backend=biber,
%    style=numeric
%]{biblatex}

%\addbibresource{../bib/main.bib}

\begin{document}
%\setstretch{1.5}
\raggedbottom


\frontmatter

\fancyhf{}
\fancyhead[LE]{\thepage}
\fancyhead[RO]{\thepage}

\maketitle
\tableofcontents

\chapter*{\termIntroduction}
\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{\termIntroduction}
\input{../src/introduction/section-0/01.00.tex}


\mainmatter

\fancyhf{}
\fancyhead[LE]{\thepage}
\fancyhead[RO]{\thepage}
\fancyhead[CE]{\leftmark}
\fancyhead[CO]{\rightmark}

\chapter{\termUntitledChapter}
\label{chapter:1}
\input{../src/chapter-1/section-0/01.00.tex}
\section{\termUntitledSection}
\label{section:1-1}
\input{../src/chapter-1/section-1/01.00.tex}


\backmatter
